newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products flat in quiet holiday market.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products flat in quiet holiday market.

text.p: European oil products were little changed but thin on Thursday due to a public holiday across much of Europe.
Gasoline was pegged around $195.50 fob Rotterdam for any May loading while regular was $11 lower.
Gas oil premiums were steady at around $1 a tonne above the IPE for Rotterdam barges loading any May. The underlying IPE was up 50 cents a tonne at $168 for May.
Heavy fuel remained well bid on the back of firm levels in Singapore. Brokers pegged Rotterdam barges around $83 and noted growing demand for low sulphur cargoes.
